This line also includes changes in an entity's share of an equity investee's Increase or Decrease in additional pension liability not yet recognized as a net periodic pension cost. Eliminated upon adoption of FAS 158.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeOtherNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income, Other, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeOtherNetOfTax.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in other comprehensive income, after tax, from changes classified as other.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Sale of Securities Included in Net Income, before Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.description: Pre tax reclassification adjustment for gains or losses realized upon the sale of securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Sale of Securities Included in Net Income, Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.description: Tax effect on the reclassification adjustment for gains or losses realized upon the sale of securities during the period.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification, Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Net Gain (Loss) Recognized in Net Periodic Benefit Cost, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.description: Net of tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for actuarial (gains) losses recognized as a component of net periodic benefit cost.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, before tax and adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, before adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOp.label: Other Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations
OtherIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOp.description: Amount of other current and other deferred income tax expense (benefit) attributable to continuing operations.

OtherInterestEarningAssets.label: Other Interest Earning Assets
OtherInterestEarningAssets.description: Amount of interest earning assets classified as other.

OtherInvestments.label: Other Investments
OtherInvestments.description: Amount of investments classified as other.

OtherInvestmentsAndSecuritiesAtCost.label: Other Investments and Securities, at Cost
OtherInvestmentsAndSecuritiesAtCost.description: Includes other investments and securities that are not at fair value as of the balance sheet date and those that are not accounted for under the equity method.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

OtherLongTermDebt.label: Other Long-term Debt
OtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Expense
OtherNonoperatingExpense.description: Amount of expense related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherShortTermInvestments.label: Other Short-term Investments
OtherShortTermInvestments.description: Amount of short-term investments classified as other.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Reductions, Change in Status
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents reductions in the amount of cumulative losses recognized in earnings for other than temporary impairments (OTTI) for which a portion of the impairment had been recognized in other comprehensive income (a component of shareholders' equity) due to a change in status of the impaired security because of a change in the entity's intent to either sell the impaired security or it has become more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell the security before recovery of its cost basis.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossDebtSecu.label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Portion Recognized in Earnings
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossDebtSecu.description: Amount of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security, recognized in earnings.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Available-for-sale Securities
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: The amount by which the fair value of an investment in debt and equity securities categorized as Available-for-sale is less than the amortized cost basis or carrying amount of that investment at the balance sheet date and the decline in fair value is deemed to be other than temporary, before considering whether or not such amount is recognized in earnings or other comprehensive income.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion Recognized in Earnings, Net, Available-for-sale Securities
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: The amount of other than temporary impairment losses on investments in debt and equity securities categorized as Available-for-sale which have been recognized in earnings during the period. Such impairment losses consist of other than temporary impairments (OTTI) on equity securities, credit losses on investments in debt securities, and when the entity intends to sell an impaired debt security or it is more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell the impaired debt security before recovery of its amortized cost basis.

OtherUnderwritingExpense.label: Other Underwriting Expense
OtherUnderwritingExpense.description: Costs incurred during the period, such as those relating to general administration and policy maintenance that do not vary with and are not primarily related to the acquisition or renewal of insurance contracts.

ParticipatingPoliciesAdditionalIncomeAll.label: Participating Insurance, Additional Income Allocated
ParticipatingPoliciesAdditionalIncomeAll.description: Amount of additional income allocated to policy holders whose contracts entitle them to a portion of the entity's earnings or surplus, paid through dividends.

PaymentsForLossesAndLossAdjustmentExpens.label: Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Claims Paid
PaymentsForLossesAndLossAdjustmentExpens.description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of payments to settle insured claims and pay costs incurred in the claims settlement process.

PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

PaymentsForProceedsFromShortTermInvestme.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Short-term Investments
PaymentsForProceedsFromShortTermInvestme.description: The net amount paid (received) by the reporting entity through acquisition or sale and maturities of short-term investments with an original maturity that is three months or less which qualify for treatment as an investing activity based on management's intention and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

PaymentsForReinsurance.label: Payments for Reinsurance
PaymentsForReinsurance.description: Cash payments made for reinsurance during the current period.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Common Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsOfDividendsPreferredStockAndPref.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsPreferredStockAndPref.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to preferred shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsToAcquireAdditionalInterestInSub.label: Payments to Acquire Additional Interest in Subsidiaries
PaymentsToAcquireAdditionalInterestInSub.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of noncontrolling interest during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Available-for-sale Securities, Equity
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: The cash outflow to acquire equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities, because they are not classified as trading securities.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquireInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Investments
PaymentsToAcquireInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of all investments (debt, security, other) during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireMarketableSecurities.label: Payments to Acquire Marketable Securities
PaymentsToAcquireMarketableSecurities.description: Amount of cash outflow for purchase of marketable security.

PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Other Investments
PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investments classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedSecuritie.label: Pledged Assets Separately Reported, Securities Pledged as Collateral, at Fair Value
PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedSecuritie.description: The sum of the fair values, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of securities that are restricted as collateral for the payment of related debt obligations, primarily secured borrowings and repurchase agreements, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedSecuritie.label: Pledged Assets Separately Reported, Securities Pledged under Letter of Credit Facilities, at Fair Value
PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedSecuritie.description: The fair value, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of securities that are restricted as collateral under letter of credit agreements, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparately.label: Pledged Financial Instruments, Not Separately Reported, Securities for Letter of Credit Facilities
PledgedFinancialInstrumentsNotSeparately.description: The carrying amount as of the date of the latest financial statement presented of securities which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for letter of credit arrangements, and for which the transferee does not have the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredNet.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Net
PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredNet.description: Amount, after effects of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to the provision for policy benefits and costs incurred.

PolicyholderContractDeposits.label: Policyholder Contract Deposit
PolicyholderContractDeposits.description: Amount of liability due to policyholder for deposit held under long-duration contract issued by insurance entity.

PolicyholderFunds.label: Policyholder Account Balance
PolicyholderFunds.description: Amount due to policyholder. Includes, but is not limited to, unpaid policy dividend, retrospective refund, and undistributed earnings on participating business. Excludes future policy benefit and claim expense.

PreferredStockDividendsIncomeStatementIm.label: Preferred Stock Dividends, Income Statement Impact
PreferredStockDividendsIncomeStatementIm.description: The amount of preferred stock dividends that is an adjustment to net income apportioned to common stockholders.

PreferredStockLiquidationPreference.label: Preferred Stock, Liquidation Preference Per Share
PreferredStockLiquidationPreference.description: The per share liquidation preference (or restrictions) of nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) that has a preference in involuntary liquidation considerably in excess of the par or stated value of the shares. The liquidation preference is the difference between the preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the share.

PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized
PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

PreferredStockSharesIssued.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Issued
PreferredStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued to shareholders (includes related preferred shares that were issued, repurchased, and remain in the treasury). May be all or portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. Excludes preferred shares that are classified as debt.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

PreferredStockValue.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
PreferredStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

PremiumIncomeSubjectToParticipationThrou.label: Premium Income Subject to Participation Through Reinsurance, Percentage (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
PremiumIncomeSubjectToParticipationThrou.description: Ratio of premium income to reinsurance.

PremiumReceivableCreditLossExpenseRevers.label: Premium Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
PremiumReceivableCreditLossExpenseRevers.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on premium receivable.

PremiumsEarnedNet.label: Premiums Earned, Net
PremiumsEarnedNet.description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums earned.

PremiumsEarnedNetPropertyAndCasualty.label: Premiums Earned, Net, Property and Casualty
PremiumsEarnedNetPropertyAndCasualty.description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of property and casualty premiums earned.

PremiumsPercentageAssumedToNet.label: SEC Schedule, 12-17, Insurance Companies, Reinsurance, Premium, Percentage Assumed to Net
PremiumsPercentageAssumedToNet.description: Percentage of assumed premium earned to premium earned after effects of reinsurance, as disclosed in supplementary reinsurance information.

PremiumsReceivableAllowanceForDoubtfulAc.label: Premium Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
PremiumsReceivableAllowanceForDoubtfulAc.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the estimated valuation allowance to reduce gross premiums receivable to net realizable value.

PremiumsReceivableAllowanceForDoubtfulAc.label: Premium Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
PremiumsReceivableAllowanceForDoubtfulAc.description: Amount of writeoff of premium receivable, charged against allowance for credit loss.

PremiumsReceivableAtCarryingValue.label: Premiums Receivable, Net
PremiumsReceivableAtCarryingValue.description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date due the entity from (a) agents and insureds, (b) uncollected premiums and (c) others, net of the allowance for doubtful accounts.

PremiumsWrittenNet.label: Premiums Written, Net
PremiumsWrittenNet.description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums written.

PremiumsWrittenNetPropertyAndCasualty.label: Premiums Written, Net, Property and Casualty (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
PremiumsWrittenNetPropertyAndCasualty.description: Premiums written for all property and casualty insurance and reinsurance contracts after subtracting any amounts ceded to another insurer.

PreOpeningCosts.label: Pre-Opening Costs
PreOpeningCosts.description: Expenditures associated with opening new locations which are noncapital in nature and expensed as incurred.

PrepaidReinsurancePremiums.label: Prepaid Reinsurance Premiums
PrepaidReinsurancePremiums.description: The unexpired portion of premiums ceded on policies in force as of the balance sheet date.

ProceedsFromContributedCapital.label: Proceeds from Contributed Capital
ProceedsFromContributedCapital.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received by a corporation from a shareholder during the period.

ProceedsFromContributionsFromAffiliates.label: Proceeds from Contributions from Affiliates
ProceedsFromContributionsFromAffiliates.description: The cash inflow from an entity that is affiliated with the entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinessesNetOf.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses, Net of Cash Divested
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinessesNetOf.description: This element represents the cash inflow during the period from the sale of a component of the entity.

ProceedsFromIncomeTaxRefunds.label: Proceeds from Income Tax Refunds
ProceedsFromIncomeTaxRefunds.description: The amount of cash received during the period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.description: Proceeds from issuance of capital stock which provides for a specific dividend that is paid to the shareholders before any dividends to common stockholders and which takes precedence over common stockholders in the event of liquidation.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSharesUnderIncenti.label: Proceeds, Issuance of Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Excluding Option Exercised
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSharesUnderIncenti.description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of shares under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes option exercised.

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.description: Amount of cash inflow from maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Notes Payable
ProceedsFromNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromPaymentsForLongTermLoansForR.label: Proceeds from Collection of (Payments to Fund) Long-term Loans to Related Parties
ProceedsFromPaymentsForLongTermLoansForR.description: The cash inflow or outflow associated with long-term loans for related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party, including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from (Payments for) Advances to Affiliates.

ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Other Financing Activities
ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities classified as other.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfOtherDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Other Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) for debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfMarketableS.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Marketable Securities
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfMarketableS.description: The cash inflow associated with the aggregate amount received by the entity through sale or maturity of marketable securities (held-to-maturity or available-for-sale) during the period.

ProceedsFromSaleMaturityAndCollectionsOf.label: Proceeds from Sale, Maturity and Collection of Investments
ProceedsFromSaleMaturityAndCollectionsOf.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale, maturity and collection of all investments such as debt, security and so forth during the period.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Available-for-sale Securities, Equity
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherInvestments.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherInvestments.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of other investments not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.description: The cash inflow from the sale of property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstate.label: Proceeds from Sale of Real Estate
ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstate.description: Cash received for the sale of real estate that is not part of an investing activity during the current period.

ProceedsFromUnsecuredLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Unsecured Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromUnsecuredLinesOfCredit.description: The cash inflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with either short term or long term maturity that is uncollateralized (where debt is not backed by the pledge of collateral).

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentUsefulLifeMaxim.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Useful Life, Maximum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentUsefulLifeMaxim.description: The maximum useful life of long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include land, buildings, machinery and equipment, and other types of furniture and equipment including, but not limited to, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment and software.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentUsefulLifeMinim.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Useful Life, Minimum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentUsefulLifeMinim.description: The minimum useful life of long lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include land, buildings, machinery and equipment, and other types of furniture and equipment including, but not limited to, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment and software.

ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.label: Accounts Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable.

RealizedGainLossOnMarketableSecuritiesAn.label: Realized Gain (Loss) on Marketable Securities and Cost Method Investments, Excluding Other than Temporary Impairments, and Other Investments (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
RealizedGainLossOnMarketableSecuritiesAn.description: This item represents the net total realized gain (loss) included in earnings for the period as a result of selling or holding marketable securities categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity, including the unrealized holding gain or loss of held-to-maturity securities transferred to the trading security category and the cumulative unrealized gain or loss which was included in other comprehensive income (a separate component of shareholders' equity) for available-for-sale securities transferred to trading securities during the period. Additionally, this item would include any gains (losses) realized during the period from the sale of investments accounted for under the cost method of accounting and/or investments that are separately or otherwise not categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity.

RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.label: Realized Investment Gains (Losses)
RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment.

ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodNet.label: Reclassification from AOCI, Current Period, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodNet.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.

ReinsuranceEffectOnClaimsAndBenefitsIncu.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Ceded
ReinsuranceEffectOnClaimsAndBenefitsIncu.description: Amount of reduction of provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for policies ceded.

ReinsuranceLossOnUncollectibleAccountsIn.label: Reinsurance, Loss on Uncollectible Accounts in Period, Amount
ReinsuranceLossOnUncollectibleAccountsIn.description: Amount of the write-down or write-off of a receivable from a reinsurer.

ReinsurancePayable.label: Reinsurance Payable
ReinsurancePayable.description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the known and estimated amounts owed to insurers under reinsurance treaties or other arrangements.

ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.label: Reinsurance Premiums for Insurance Companies, by Product Segment, Percentage of Amount Assumed to Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.description: Percentage of amount of premiums assumed from other companies to net amount of premiums.

ReinsuranceReceivablesIncurredButNotRepo.label: Reinsurance Recoverables, Incurred but Not Reported Claims
ReinsuranceReceivablesIncurredButNotRepo.description: Estimated amount after valuation allowance of reinsurance recoverables, due from reinsurers for incurred claims not yet reported, and claims settlement expenses.

ReinsuranceReceivablesPaidLossesRecovera.label: Reinsurance Receivables (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
ReinsuranceReceivablesPaidLossesRecovera.description: Amount after valuation allowance currently billed or billable under reinsurance contracts.

ReinsuranceRecoverableCreditLossExpenseR.label: Reinsurance Recoverable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ReinsuranceRecoverableCreditLossExpenseR.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on reinsurance recoverable.

ReinsuranceRecoverableForUnpaidClaimsAnd.label: Reinsurance Recoverable for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustments
ReinsuranceRecoverableForUnpaidClaimsAnd.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts for losses reported to the ceding insurer but not yet paid and amounts expected for incurred losses and settlement expenses, which have not yet been reported to the ceding insurer.

ReinsuranceRecoverables.label: Reinsurance Recoverables, Including Reinsurance Premium Paid
ReinsuranceRecoverables.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts including premium paid under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, premium paid, policy benefits and policy reserves.

ReinsuranceRecoverablesAllowance.label: Reinsurance Recoverable, Allowance for Credit Loss
ReinsuranceRecoverablesAllowance.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on reinsurance recoverable.

ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnPaidAndUnpaidLo.label: Reinsurance Recoverable for Paid and Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustments
ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnPaidAndUnpaidLo.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, policy benefits and policy reserves. Excludes premiums paid under reinsurance contracts.

ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnPaidLosses.label: Reinsurance Recoverable for Paid Claims and Claims Adjustments
ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnPaidLosses.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts for losses reported to and paid by the ceding insurer.

RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.label: Related Party Transaction, Due from (to) Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.description: Receivables to be collected from (obligations owed to) related parties, net as of the balance sheet date where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Repayments of Notes Payable
RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ReserveForLossesAndLossAdjustmentExpense.label: Reserve for Losses and Loss Adjustment Expenses (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ReserveForLossesAndLossAdjustmentExpense.description: Alternate concept name for the aggregate amount of policy reserves (provided for future obligations including unpaid claims and claims adjustment expenses) and policy benefits (liability for future policy benefits) as of the balance sheet date; grouped amount of all the liabilities associated with the company's insurance policies.

RestructuringAndRelatedCostIncurredCost.label: Restructuring and Related Cost, Incurred Cost
RestructuringAndRelatedCostIncurredCost.description: Discloses the amount charged against the accrued restructuring reserves, or earnings if not previously accrued, during the period for the specified type of restructuring cost.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Excluding Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.description: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SalesRevenueGoodsNet.label: Sales Revenue, Goods, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesRevenueGoodsNet.description: Aggregate revenue during the period from the sale of goods in the normal course of business, after deducting returns, allowances and discounts.

SeniorNotes.label: Senior Notes
SeniorNotes.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of Notes with the highest claim on the assets of the issuer in case of bankruptcy or liquidation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer). Senior note holders are paid off in full before any payments are made to junior note holders.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Compensation Cost (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Equity-based compensation cost during the period with respect to the award, which will be recognized in income (as well as the total recognized tax benefit) or capitalized as part of the cost of an asset.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Discount from Market Price, Offering Date
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Discount rate from fair value on offering date that participants pay for shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Dividend Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated dividend rate (a percentage of the share price) to be paid (expected dividends) to holders of the underlying shares over the option's term.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Term (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The period of time an equity-based award is expected to be outstanding. An equity-based award's expected term is generally determined based on, among other factors, the instrument's contractual term and the effects of employees' expected exercise and post-vesting employment termination behavior.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Term, Maximum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The maximum period of time an equity-based award is expected to be outstanding. An equity-based award's expected term is generally determined based on, among other factors, the instrument's contractual term and the effects of employees' expected exercise and post-vesting employment termination behavior.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Term, Minimum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The minimum period of time an equity-based award is expected to be outstanding. An equity-based award's expected term is generally determined based on, among other factors, the instrument's contractual term and the effects of employees' expected exercise and post-vesting employment termination behavior.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Volatility Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated measure of the percentage by which a share price is expected to fluctuate during a period. Volatility also may be defined as a probability-weighted measure of the dispersion of returns about the mean. The volatility of a share price is the standard deviation of the continuously compounded rates of return on the share over a specified period. That is the same as the standard deviation of the differences in the natural logarithms of the stock prices plus dividends, if any, over the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Volatility Rate, Maximum
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated measure of the maximum percentage by which a share price is expected to fluctuate during a period. Volatility also may be defined as a probability-weighted measure of the dispersion of returns about the mean. The volatility of a share price is the standard deviation of the continuously compounded rates of return on the share over a specified period. That is the same as the standard deviation of the differences in the natural logarithms of the stock prices plus dividends, if any, over the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Volatility Rate, Minimum
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated measure of the minimum percentage by which a share price is expected to fluctuate during a period. Volatility also may be defined as a probability-weighted measure of the dispersion of returns about the mean. The volatility of a share price is the standard deviation of the continuously compounded rates of return on the share over a specified period. That is the same as the standard deviation of the differences in the natural logarithms of the stock prices plus dividends, if any, over the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate, Maximum
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The maximum risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate, Minimum
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The minimum risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Number of Shares Authorized
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of shares authorized for issuance under share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares into which fully or partially vested stock options outstanding as of the balance sheet date can be currently converted under the option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted-average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance on vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average price at which option holders acquired shares when converting their stock options into shares under the plan during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures and Expirations in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: For presentations that combine terminations, the number of shares under options that were cancelled during the reporting period as a result of occurrence of a terminating event specified in contractual agreements pertaining to the stock option plan or that expired.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures and Expirations in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price of options that were either forfeited or expired.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Net of Forfeitures
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Net number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance on stock options awarded under the plan during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding that can be converted into shares under option plan. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted-average exercise price, at which grantee can acquire shares reserved for issuance, for fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

ShortDurationContractsDiscountedLiabilit.label: Short-Duration Contracts, Discounted Liabilities, Amount
ShortDurationContractsDiscountedLiabilit.description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of loss reserves carried at present value.

ShortDurationContractsDiscountedLiabilit.label: Short-Duration Contract, Discounted Liability, Discount Rate
ShortDurationContractsDiscountedLiabilit.description: Discount rate used to obtain present value of liability for unpaid claim and claim adjustment expense for short-duration contract issued by insurance entity.

ShortdurationInsuranceContractsDiscounte.label: Short-duration Insurance Contract, Discounted Liability, Discount
ShortdurationInsuranceContractsDiscounte.description: Amount of cumulative discount related to the time value of money deducted from short-duration insurance contract liabilities that are reported at present value.

ShortdurationInsuranceContractsDiscounte.label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Discounted Liabilities, Interest Accretion
ShortdurationInsuranceContractsDiscounte.description: Amount of interest accretion recognized for short-duration insurance contract liabilities that are reported at present value.

ShortdurationInsuranceContractsLiability.label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Liability for Unpaid Claims and Allocated Claim Adjustment Expense, Net
ShortdurationInsuranceContractsLiability.description: Undiscounted amount, after reinsurance, of the liability for unpaid claims and allocated claim adjustment expense for short-duration insurance contracts. Excludes unallocated claim adjustment expense.

ShortdurationInsuranceContractsLiability.label: Short-duration Insurance Contracts, Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Accumulated Unallocated Claim Adjustment Expense
ShortdurationInsuranceContractsLiability.description: Amount of liability for unallocated claim adjustment expense for short-duration insurance contracts.

ShortTermInvestments.label: Short-term Investments
ShortTermInvestments.description: Amount of investments including trading securities, available-for-sale securities, held-to-maturity securities, and short-term investments classified as other and current.

StateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitCont.label: State and Local Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations
StateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitCont.description: Amount of state and local current and deferred income tax expense (benefit) attributable to continuing operations.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Capital and Surplus, Balance
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.description: The amount of statutory capital and surplus (stockholders' equity) as of the balance sheet date using prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices (rather than GAAP, if different) of the state or country.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNet.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Net Income Amount
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNet.description: Amount of net income for the period determined using accounting principles prescribed or permitted by insurance regulators.

StockDividendsShares.label: Stock Dividends, Shares
StockDividendsShares.description: Number of shares of common and preferred stock issued as dividends during the period. Excludes stock splits.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.description: Number of share options (or share units) exercised during the current period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Employee Stock Purchase Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.description: Aggregate change in value for stock issued during the period as a result of employee stock purchase plan.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockDividen.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Dividend
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockDividen.description: Value of stock issued to shareholders as a dividend during the period.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Shares
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and have not been retired and are not held in treasury. Some state laws may govern the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount.label: Stock Repurchase Program, Authorized Amount (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount.description: Amount of a stock repurchase plan authorized by an entity's Board of Directors.

StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount1.label: Stock Repurchase Program, Authorized Amount
StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount1.description: Amount of stock repurchase plan authorized.

StockRepurchaseProgramNumberOfSharesAuth.label: Stock Repurchase Program, Number of Shares Authorized to be Repurchased
StockRepurchaseProgramNumberOfSharesAuth.description: The number of shares authorized to be repurchased by an entity's Board of Directors under a stock repurchase plan.

SubleaseIncome.label: Sublease Income
SubleaseIncome.description: Amount of sublease income excluding finance and operating lease expense.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Amortization of Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount of amortization expense on deferred policy acquisition cost for property-casualty insurance underwriter.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: Current Year Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense for claims incurred in the current reporting period and related claims settlement costs.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount of deferred policy acquisition cost related to property-casualty insurance policy written.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Discount Deducted from Reserve
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount of discount deducted from reserve for unpaid claim and claim adjustment expense by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Earned Premium
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount of premium revenue earned by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Net Investment Income
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount of net investment income earned by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Paid Claim and Claim Adjustment Expense
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount of loss reported and paid for claim and claim adjustment expense by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Premium Written
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount of premium written by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: Prior Year Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense (reversal of expense) for claims incurred in prior reporting periods and related claims settlement costs.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Reserve for Unpaid Claim and Claim Adjustment Expense
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount of reserve, policy claim payable and loss expense incurred by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: SEC Schedule, 12-18, Supplemental Information, Property-Casualty Insurance Underwriters, Unearned Premium
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount of premium written but not yet earned by property-casualty insurance underwriter.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationAmortiz.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Amortization of Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationAmortiz.description: Amount of amortization of deferred policy acquisition cost recognized, as disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationBenefit.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Benefit, Claim, Loss and Settlement Expenses
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationBenefit.description: Amount of insurance benefit, claim, loss and settlement expenses incurred, as disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationDeferre.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationDeferre.description: Amount of deferred policy acquisition cost capitalized on contract remaining in force, as disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationLiabili.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Loss, Claim and Loss Expense
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationLiabili.description: Amount of reserve for future policy claim payable and loss expense to be incurred, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationNetInve.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Net Investment Income
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationNetInve.description: Amount of net investment income earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherPo.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Other Policy Claim and Benefit Payable
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherPo.description: Amount of claim and benefit payable classified as other, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationPremium.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Premium Revenue
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationPremium.description: Amount of premium revenue earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationPremium.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Premium Written
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationPremium.description: Amount, after premiums ceded and assumed, of premium written, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationUnearne.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Unearned Premium
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationUnearne.description: Amount of premium not yet earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ReclassificationF.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Reclassification from AOCI to Retained Earnings, Tax Effect
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ReclassificationF.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for reclassification to retained earnings of tax effect from remeasurement of deferred tax pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

TaxesPayableCurrent.label: Taxes Payable, Current
TaxesPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

TradingSecuritiesDebt.label: Debt Securities, Trading
TradingSecuritiesDebt.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.label: Treasury Stock Acquired, Average Cost Per Share
TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.description: Total cost of shares repurchased divided by the total number of shares repurchased.

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.label: Treasury Stock, Shares, Acquired
TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and are being held in treasury.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

UnamortizedDebtIssuanceExpense.label: Unamortized Debt Issuance Expense
UnamortizedDebtIssuanceExpense.description: The remaining balance of debt issuance expenses that were capitalized and are being amortized against income over the lives of the respective bond issues. This does not include the amounts capitalized as part of the cost of the utility plant or asset.

UnderwritingIncomeLoss.label: Underwriting Income (Loss)
UnderwritingIncomeLoss.description: The difference between the price paid by the public and the contract price less the related expenses. A broker-dealer may underwrite a security offering by contracting to buy the issue either at a fixed price or a price based on selling the offering on a best-effort basis.

UnearnedPremiums.label: Unearned Premiums
UnearnedPremiums.description: Carrying amount of premiums written on insurance contracts that have not been earned as of the balance sheet date.

UnrealizedGainOnForeignCurrencyDerivativ.label: Unrealized Gain on Foreign Currency Derivatives, before Tax
UnrealizedGainOnForeignCurrencyDerivativ.description: Amount of unrealized gain related to the increase in fair value of foreign currency exchange rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments. Recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Settlements with Taxing Authorities
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount of statutory penalties accrued for a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed by the entity, in its tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties Expense
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount of expense for penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Foreign Currency Translation
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from foreign currency translation.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.description: Amount of interest expense accrued for an underpayment of income taxes.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Expense
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.description: Amount of interest expense for an underpayment of income taxes.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Period Increase (Decrease)
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in unrecognized tax benefits attributable to uncertain tax positions taken in tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.

ValuationAllowanceAmount.label: Valuation Allowance, Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ValuationAllowanceAmount.description: The amount of the valuation allowance recorded as of the balance sheet date pertaining to the specified deferred tax asset for which an assessment was made that it is more likely than not that all or a portion of such deferred tax asset will not be realized through related deductions on future tax returns.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesAdjustment.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Increase (Decrease) Adjustment
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesAdjustment.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from adjustment.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesBalance.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Amount
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesBalance.description: Amount of valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToC.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Additions, Charge to Cost and Expense
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToC.description: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from charge to cost and expense.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToO.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Additions, Charge to Other Account
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToO.description: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from charge to accounts other than cost and expense.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesDeductions.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Deduction
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesDeductions.description: Amount of decrease in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesReservesOf.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Business Acquired
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesReservesOf.description: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from business combination.

VariableLeaseCost.label: Variable Lease, Cost
VariableLeaseCost.description: Amount of variable lease cost, excluded from lease liability, recognized when obligation for payment is incurred for finance and operating leases.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WorkersCompensationDiscountAmount.label: Workers' Compensation Discount, Amount
WorkersCompensationDiscountAmount.description: Current year monetary amount of the change in worker's compensation reserve liability resulting from the discount applied to reduce the reserve to present value.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Amortized Cost, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, after Year 5 Through 10
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in sixth through tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Fair Value, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, after Year 5 Through 10
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in sixth through tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Amortized Cost, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, after Year One Through Five
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Fair Value, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, after Year One Through Five
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in second through fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Amortized Cost, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, after Year 10
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing after tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Fair Value, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, after Year 10
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing after tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Amortized Cost, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Year One
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Fair Value, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Year One
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, without Single Maturity Date, Amortized Cost
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), without single maturity date and not allocated over maturity grouping.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, without Single Maturity Date, Fair Value
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), without single maturity date and not allocated over maturity grouping.

DebtAndEquitySecuritiesUnrealizedGainLos.label: Debt and Equity Securities, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
DebtAndEquitySecuritiesUnrealizedGainLos.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt and equity securities.

DeferredTaxAssetsUnrealizedLossesOnTradi.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Unrealized Losses on Trading Securities
DeferredTaxAssetsUnrealizedLossesOnTradi.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from unrealized losses on trading securities.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesInvestments.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Investments
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesInvestments.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from investments (excludes investments in subsidiaries and equity method investments).

LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustm.label: Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Business Acquisitions
LiabilityForUnpaidClaimsAndClaimsAdjustm.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the cost of settling unpaid claims after deduction of reinsurance recoveries related to the acquisition of a business. Includes, but is not limited to, claims which have been incurred but not reported.

OciBeforeReclassificationsNetOfTaxAttrib.label: OCI, before Reclassifications, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
